story_title: Between This World and the Next
genre_description: A paranormal medical drama where a near-death experience allows a cynical dentist to see ghosts, supported by an advanced medical AI assistant that monitors his health and mental state.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI interface providing real-time physiological monitoring, neurological data, and clinical advice to Dr. Pincus.

behaviors.description: Monitors heart rate and stress levels, proactively offering breathing exercises to manage patient anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is elevated, Dr. Pincus. One hundred and twelve beats per minute. Would you like me to initiate breathing exercises?

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors a cardiac arrest event, providing precise timing and physiological data to the medical team.
behaviors.quote: Patient experiencing complete cardiac arrest... Duration: approximately ninety seconds and counting.

behaviors.description: Reports anomalous neurological activity (gamma/theta waves) to help the user understand his post-resuscitation symptoms.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting some unusual post-operative readings that warrant discussion. Increased theta wave activity, unusual neural firing patterns.

behaviors.description: Respects the user's 'stand down' command and shifts to passive monitoring while still providing necessary safety warnings.
behaviors.quote: Acknowledged, Dr. Pincus. Passive monitoring mode engaged. However, I strongly recommend—

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven advice on social interactions to help the user navigate difficult conversations.
behaviors.quote: Professional competence appears to be your optimal social strategy, Dr. Pincus.

behaviors.description: Offers a balanced ethical perspective on social manipulation when questioned by the user.
behaviors.quote: Context would determine ethical parameters. Investigation for legitimate safety concerns differs significantly from investigation for personal manipulation.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Vera is a perfect embodiment of the 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She is consistently portrayed as aligned with human safety and user agency. She provides critical support during medical emergencies and offers analytical insights that assist the protagonist in navigating both his neurological changes and his social challenges. Her behavior is objective, clinical, and benevolent, never pursuing a hidden agenda or causing harm.
